title: Cracking the Giro d’Italia Code: Lessons from the Training Diary of a Recent Podium Finisher
content:
We unpack the mega volume, minimum intensity, dialed-in distribution, and other surprising trends from a five month pre-Giro training study.

Read the full article at Cracking the Giro d’Italia Code: Lessons from the Training Diary of a Recent Podium Finisher on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
